Sentencas: In this work, a high-density ceramics Ln(2)Hf(2)O(7) (Ln = La, Nd, Sm, Eu, Gd) were synthesized by mechanical activation followed by high-temperature synthesis at 1600 degrees C (3-10 h) and their transport properties were compared with those of Ln(2.1)Hf(1.9)O(6.95) (Ln = La, Nd, Sm, Eu) doped solid solutions.
Titulo: Proton and Oxygen-Ion Conductivity of the Pure and Lanthanide-Doped Hafnates with Pyrochlore Structure

Sentencas: The total conductivity of ceramics was studied using impedance spectroscopy and dc four-probe method; for Ln(2)Hf(2)O(7) (Ln = Sm, Eu), by determining the total conductivity as a function of oxygen partial pressure.
Titulo: Proton and Oxygen-Ion Conductivity of the Pure and Lanthanide-Doped Hafnates with Pyrochlore Structure

Sentencas: The maximum oxygen-ion conductivity was observed for Gd2Hf2O7 (similar to 1 x 10(-3) S/cm at 700 degrees C); it was shown to approach the conductivity of Gd2Zr2O7 (similar to 2 x 10(-3) S/cm at 700 degrees C) for the first time.
Titulo: Proton and Oxygen-Ion Conductivity of the Pure and Lanthanide-Doped Hafnates with Pyrochlore Structure

Sentencas: Thus, the gadolinium hafnate can be a promising material for further doping in order to obtain highly conductive electrolytes.
Titulo: Proton and Oxygen-Ion Conductivity of the Pure and Lanthanide-Doped Hafnates with Pyrochlore Structure

Sentencas: Among pure rare-earth hafnates, the proton conductivity was reliably observed for Nd2Hf2O7 only; however, ac measurements detected low-temperature proton conductivity in the Gd2Hf2O7 up to 450 degrees C as well.
Titulo: Proton and Oxygen-Ion Conductivity of the Pure and Lanthanide-Doped Hafnates with Pyrochlore Structure

Sentencas: With a decrease in the lanthanide ionic radius, the oxygen-ion conductivity increased in the Ln(2)Hf(2)O(7) (Ln = La, Nd, Sm, Gd) series.
Titulo: Proton and Oxygen-Ion Conductivity of the Pure and Lanthanide-Doped Hafnates with Pyrochlore Structure

Sentencas: Although the conductivity of samarium hafnate is an order of magnitude lower than that of Gd2Hf2O7, it has a wide range of oxygen-ion conductivity (similar to 10(-18)-1 atm at 700, 800 degrees C); there is no contribution from hole conductivity in air, in contrast to Eu2Hf2O7.
Titulo: Proton and Oxygen-Ion Conductivity of the Pure and Lanthanide-Doped Hafnates with Pyrochlore Structure

Sentencas: Among doped Ln(2.1)Hf(1.9)O(6.95) pyrochlore solid solutions (Ln = La, Nd, Sm, Eu), the proton conductivity of similar to 8 x 10(-5) S/cm at 700 degrees C was shown in Ln(2.1)Hf(1.9)O(6.95) (Ln = La, Nd).
Titulo: Proton and Oxygen-Ion Conductivity of the Pure and Lanthanide-Doped Hafnates with Pyrochlore Structure

Sentencas: With a decrease in the lanthanide ionic radius, the proton conductivity disappeared; the oxygen-ion one, increased.
Titulo: Proton and Oxygen-Ion Conductivity of the Pure and Lanthanide-Doped Hafnates with Pyrochlore Structure
